import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import editButton from '../images/edit-button.svg' import plus from '../images/plus.svg' import Card from './Card'; import {CurrentUserContext} from '../contexts/CurrentUserContext.js' function Main({ onEditAvatar, onEditProfile, onAddPlace, onCardClick, cards, onCardsLike, onCardDelete }) { const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUserContext); return (

{currentUser?.name}

{currentUser?.about}

{ cards.map((card) => ( ))}
) }; export default Main
